homePage.headerLeftTwo: Manage multi-channel orders easily, quickly and save more time

BodyOne.itemOne: Prevent a supply shortage and inventory

BodyTwo.titleOne: Management software to help you optimize
BodyTwo.titleFour: Synchronous system when orders arise on channels
BodyTwo.titleFive: Hệ thống đồng bộ khi đơn hàng phát sinh trên các kênh
BodyTwo.itemOne: The software helps to connect and synchronize orders when arising on the Website,Social networks (Facebook, Zalo, Instagram),E-commerce platform (Shopee, Tiki, Lazada, Tiktokshop) or at the Store to a single place to help you manage easy order
BodyTwo.itemTwo: Quickly create orders when Chat or customers visit the Store and sync to one place on the system

BodyThree.titleTwo: Centralized order processing according to the most professional and optimal process for sellers :
BodyThree.titleThree: Handling when orders are refunded or canceled
BodyThree.itemOne: Order validation (make sure there are no errors)
BodyThree.itemTwo: Delivery processing (Connect, Select and transfer orders quickly to carriers)
BodyThree.itemFour: Handle events as they arise,, defective or canceled orders…
BodyThree.itemFive: Connect with more than 15 popular carriers to help you compare and choose the best price carrier by area, the order after being processed will automatically be shipped to the designated delivery unit quickly …
BodyThree.itemSix: The system allows to process Refunded, Canceled or Defective orders, and updates order status to help you control your business more effectively.
BodyThree.itemSeven: Easily export order data by filter to serve other businesses

BodyFour.itemOne: Advanced order filters make it easy to look up orders by customer, sales channel, delivery status, payment status or order value...
BodyFour.itemTwo: Track delivery status from many carriers right on Haravan online order management software, monitor order status accurately from picking up goods in stock to delivering goods to customers.
BodyFour.itemThree: Update order status via Email, Zalo, SMS, Messenger for customers, showing professionalism and engagement with customers

BodyFive.titleFour: PRINT INVOICE OF SALE, SHIPPING COLLECTIONS
BodyFive.itemOne: Choose to print orders quickly from 1 or more orders, ensuring full information to customers as well as carriers
BodyFive.itemTwo: Product inventory is always updated in real time when orders arise to avoid shortages or inventory.
BodyFive.itemThree: Order management software helps to integrate all online payment methods into the system to help you easily track the payment status; View sales reports, revenue and expenditure books as well as track supplier debt, shipping partner debt...

BodyEight.titleOne: Interesting things and achievements that HUY LE would like to share with you.
BodyEight.titleTwo: We are the first technology partner in Vietnam honored to be recommended by Google as a Platform for Retailers, providing a form of Google Ads that helps businesses reach millions of people searching for shopping information every day on different websites. Google platform.
BodyEight.titleThree: Honored to be Meta Business Partner and the only Vietnamese partner on the list of developers of technology platforms to support business on Facebook Messenger.
